name: 譚巽言
objective: １.TTL，CMOS邏輯閘之特性實習２.組合邏輯電路設計實習含：算術電路，比較器，解碼器，編碼器，多工器，解多工器等３.序向邏輯電路設計與應用：正反器，計數器，記錄器，及移位暫存器等綜合應用４.D/A和A/D之轉換與應用５.利用ASM圖之電路設計實習６.PLD設計規劃７.專題實作。
schedule:
week1:         Introduction
week2~week6:   Hardware practices
                   Basic Logic gates: AND, OR, NOT, NAND, NOR, XOR
week7~week14:  Software practices
                   Verilog HDL simulations
                   VHDL simulations
week15~week17: Asynchronous logic design, Micropipelines
week18:        Final examination
scorePolicy:
Practice result demos                   40 %
Practice reports                        40 %
Final Exam                              20 %
Class participations (extra credits)    10 %
